_sText:
NEW VERSION (08/29/2010) It's the new version of mg_fun_multimods_2010 with 2 levels add (item_battle and race). I fixed some bugs too. Good Luck and ENJOY !

>>>>>>>>>>>>"http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/143634"<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
















EDITED (06/25/2010) After the css update, 2 levels bug and don't work, so I made an other version of this map, just dowlnoad it.


Hello guys ! (sorry for my bad english)

I made this map (352 hours of work). It's an allinone map with 7 levels, a nice design,
a gameplay of dream, an original spawn and chooselevel, and a lot of other things... There are a lot of details too 
(for example the town on start). This map work with 64 players. Map optimized with some sounds like mg_fun_multigames (i made it ^^).
So, the levels are : 

***************
SURF
***************

THEME : Metal Area
GAMEPLAY : Easy surf ramps
DETAILS : Nice level with a jail (usp if fall in) and some ramps (if finished you can have a deagle with an awp).

***************
ITEM_BATTLE
***************

THEME : Forest 
GAMEPLAY : Enjoy !
DETAILS : There are 6 different item :
- Sex toy laser with splash
- Horse with a sword
- Jet-Pack
- A tree
- Paddle to activate spikes
- Monitor to explode your enemies

***************
TETRIS
***************

THEME : Tetris textures 
GAMEPLAY : Agility recommended
DETAILS : In this level, you have to avoid the blocs who fall in the sky. Move your body !

***************
BASIC
***************

THEME : Snowbase
GAMEPLAY : Like in an AIM
DETAILS : This level have a buyzone and a lot of other things...

***************
SLIDERACE
***************

THEME : Metal Area 
GAMEPLAY : A little bit hard
DETAILS : You are pushed forward and you have to avoid the obstacle

***************
CAR_RACE
***************

THEME : Race Stadium
GAMEPLAY : Funny and original
DETAILS : You have to drive your lamborghini and reach the finish the first ! After that, run for your deagle !

***************
CLIMB
***************

THEME : Forest
GAMEPLAY : A little bit hard
DETAILS : You have to climb before the flood !

I used custom textures and models.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.mg-fr.com

http://www.niko-mapping-studio.tk

(=^^=)
